role_dependencies: Ensures Snap is installed on Linux systems
role_description: An Ansible role that installs VLC on nearly any platform
role_description_full_overview: [VLC](https://www.videolan.org/) media player is a free and open-source, portable, cross-platform media player software, and streaming media server developed by the VideoLAN project. VLC is available for desktop operating systems, and mobile platforms, such as Android, iOS, iPadOS, Tizen, Windows 10 Mobile, and Windows Phone.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs VLC on nearly any platform.
